content: sections as follows measured from just below garter st neckband set-up row ws k9 10 11 12 13 14 for right if the yoke is not quite deep enough work up front pm k8 for right sleeve pm k20 22 24 26 to 4 row in st st back and forth knit on rs 28 30 sts for back pm k8 for left sleeve pm row purl on ws row until the correct and k9 10 11 12 13 14 for left front there are approx yoke depth is achieved 4 markers placed along row divide for body raglan increases with the rs facing knit to marker remove increase row rs knit to 1 st from first marker marker slip next 34 36 38 40 42 44 sts from m1l k1 sm *k1 m1r knit to 1 st before next left sleeve to waste yarn or st holder remove marker m1l k1 sm repeat from * three more marker using the backwards loop method times k1 m1r knit to end 8 sts increased cast on 4 4 4 4 6 6 sts for left underarm knit next row ws purl slipping all markers across back to next marker remove marker slip next 34 36 38 40 42 44 sts from right repeat last 2 row twice more there are 12 13 sleeve to waste yarn or st holder remove marker 14 15 16 17 sts for each front 14 sts for each using the backwards loop method cast on 4 sleeve and 26 28 30 32 34 36 sts for back 78 4 4 4 6 6 sts for right underarm and knit to 82 86 90 94 98 sts total end there are now 98 106 114 122 134 142 sts on needle row 1 rs and increase row knit to 1 st from first marker m1l k1 sm *k1 m1r knit to 1 st body before next marker m1l k1 sm repeat from * work even in st st back and forth until body three more times k1 m1r knit to end 8 sts measures 5½ 6 6½ 7 7½ 9 / 14 15 16 5 18 19 increased 23 cm from underarm ending with a ws row row 2 ws *knit to 1 st before next marker p1 sm p1 repeat from * three more times knit to shape back hem optional end this row forms the garter st ridge seen if you do not wish to work short row to shape on the rs of yoke the back hem proceed to hem row 3 rs and increase row work the same short row 1 rs k74 80 86 92 101 107 w&t as row 1 short row 2 ws p50 54 58 62 68 72 w&t 3 short row 3 knit to 3 sts from wrapped st w&t short row 4 purl to 3 sts from wrapped st w&t front bands repeat short row 3-4 once more girls button band next row rs knit concealing wrapped
